landingPage.slogan: The platform to bring developers together with your application ideas.

addImage.imageInfo: This image will be shown in the feed. Pick something attractive to lure as many collapporators as possible.

addLinks.linksInfo: The links will be shown in your project page. Include links of your github page or additional resources.

addMarkdownDescription.markdownDescriptionInfo: The markdown description is where you put an extensive description of what your project is about. You can provide additional information on the idea behind the concept, design choices, used techniques together with images.

addSmallDescription.smallDescriptionInfo: This description will be shown in the feed. Describe your project in a few lines to enthuse other collapporators.

addTags.tagsInfo: The tags will be shown in the feed. These tags describe the catagories or used techniques of the concept. Tags will also be used in filtering.

addTitle.title: Title
addTitle.titleInfo: The title will be shown as header in the feed. Pick something that describes your project best in a few words. This title will also be used in filtering for keywords.
